title: Repositories
description: The NFX ecosystem includes multiple open-source projects, each with its specific purpose and functionality.

nfxStack.description: NFX-Stack is the core resource stack of the NFX ecosystem, providing foundational services such as MySQL, Redis, and Kafka.

nfxEdge.description: NFX-Edge is a multi-website reverse proxy solution based on Traefik, providing unified multi-website management and automatic HTTPS support.

nfxVault.description: NFX-Vault is a modern SSL certificate management and monitoring system, providing unified certificate application, checking, export, and management functions.

nfxDocumentation.description: NFX-Documentation is the deployment and configuration strategy documentation for NFX projects, providing detailed deployment guides and best practices.
